api:field.name: research-interests-html

api:html-text.plain-text: My main research focus is on semantic technologies and how to use intelligent applications and agents to solve practical problems in different domains. Specifically, I am interested in building ontologies for modelling knowledge found within domains and then creating intelligent systems to utilise the knowledge base. I have experience in developing ontologies for domains such as autonomous robotics, clinical laboratories and psychology. I am also interested in knowledge representation and knowledge extraction from medical text using natural language processing techniques.
